channel.title: Products on Christopher Nadeau
channel.description: Recent content in Products on Christopher Nadeau

item.title: Ditching Google
item.description: Over the years, there have been so many blog posts determined to convince us that Google is becoming evil. This isn’t one of those kinds of rants. I don’t really mind Google as a company. I love my Nexus 5, I still use Google search and I love Google Chrome. I think they do some pretty stupid stuff from time to time (more on this below), but I don’t think they’re fundamentally an evil company and my moving away from them isn’t some kind of political statement.
